DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Sentinel Node Navigation Surgery Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective phase II clinical trial sentinel node navigation surgery ( SNNS ) early gastric cancer . Laparoscopic SNNS : 1 . ICG 99mTc-antimony sulfur colloid ( ASC ) submucosal injection intraoperative endoscopy 2 . Sentinel node basin identification dissection 3 . Sentinel node pick back table 4 . Frozen biopsy sentinel node ( hematoxylin eosin stain immunohistochemistry cytokeratin ) 5 . If sentinel node biopsy frozen section negative , limited gastrectomy perform positive , radical D2 gastrectomy perform . Sample size : 100 case Study duration : 5 year ( 2year enrollment , 3 year follow-up )
